name: Incident Count
description: Count of incident types by establishment and status for a given period

dataset.name: Count of incidents per location
dataset.query:
SELECT cast(date_trunc('week', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, location, r.type, ct.description as type_description, count(*) num_of_incidents
FROM report r join constant_status on r.status = constant_status.code join constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code WHERE status != 'DUPLICATE'
group by date_trunc('week', r.incident_date_and_time), r.location, r.type, ct.description

dataset.name: Count of incidents per location per month
dataset.query:
SELECT cast(date_trunc('month', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, location, r.type, ct.description as type_description, count(*) num_of_incidents
FROM report r join constant_status on r.status = constant_status.code join constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code WHERE status != 'DUPLICATE'
group by date_trunc('month', r.incident_date_and_time), r.location, r.type, ct.description

dataset.name: Count of incidents by day
dataset.query: SELECT cast(date_trunc('day', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, location, type, status, count(*) num_of_incidents FROM report WHERE status != 'DUPLICATE' group by date_trunc('day', incident_date_and_time), location, type, status

dataset.name: Count of incidents by week
dataset.query: SELECT cast(date_trunc('week', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, location, type, status, count(*) num_of_incidents FROM report WHERE status != 'DUPLICATE' group by date_trunc('week', incident_date_and_time), location, type, status

dataset.name: Count of incidents by month
dataset.query: SELECT cast(date_trunc('month', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, location, type, status, count(*) num_of_incidents FROM report WHERE status != 'DUPLICATE' group by date_trunc('month', incident_date_and_time), location, type, status

report.name: Count of incident reports by week and location
report.description: Counts of incidents by type and location for each week

report.name: Count of incident reports by month and location
report.description: Counts of incidents by type and location for each month

report.name: Count of incident reports by day
report.description: Counts of incidents by type, status and location for each day

report.name: Count of incident reports by week
report.description: Counts of incidents by type, status and location for each week

report.name: Count of incident reports by month
report.description: Counts of incidents by type, status and location for each month
